price: Apakah kamu mengira bahwa orang-orang yang mendiami gua dan (yang mempunyai) raqīm 872 itu, mereka termasuk tanda-tanda kekuasaan Kami yang mengherankan?
arabic: أَمۡ حَسِبۡتَ أَنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡكَهۡفِ وَٱلرَّقِيمِ كَانُواْ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِنَا عَجَبًا
footnotes: 872.  Raqīm, sebagian ahli tafsir mengartikan nama anjing dan sebagian yang lain mengartikan batu bersurat.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: am ḥasib'ta anna aṣḥāba al-kahfi wal-raqīmi kānū min āyātinā ʿajaban
